definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
see 是騾子是馬，牽出來遛遛|是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛[shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5]
pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , la1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
containing_words.word: 是骡子是马，拉出来遛遛

definition: lit. to see whether it's a mule or a horse, take it out for a walk (idiom)/fig. the proof of the pudding is in the eating/to show what one is made of
pinyin: shi4 luo2 zi5 shi4 ma3 , qian1 chu1 lai5 liu4 liu5
containing_words.word: 是骡子是马，牵出来遛遛

sentences.english: The mule was frightened and ran away, kicking wildly.
sentences.chinese: 骡子惊恐不已，疯狂地踢动着跑开。

sentences.english: If I had that much money, I'd buy another mule.
sentences.chinese: 要是我有那么多钱，我早就另买一头骡子了。

sentences.english: They of the house of Togarmah traded in thy fairs with horses and horsemen and mules.
sentences.chinese: 陀迦玛族用马和战马并骡子兑换你的货物。

sentences.english: His head hangs forward like a sleeping mule.
sentences.chinese: 他的脑袋向前伸着，就像一头正在睡觉的骡子。

sentences.english: A rare pedigreed entrant in a summer of mules.
sentences.chinese: 在一群夏季影片的骡子里，这是一匹罕见的纯种马。

sentences.english: A few days later, the farmer's mother-in-law was killed when his mule kicked her.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，农夫的丈母娘被骡子踢到而伤重不治。

sentences.english: Liu cracked his whip violently across the head of the mule pulling Trinket's cart.
sentences.chinese: 刘一舟手中马鞭挥出，向大车前的骡子头上用力抽去。

sentences.english: Two mules well-laden with packs were trudging along.
sentences.chinese: 两头骡子驮着包裹长途跋涉。

sentences.english: Black mule transit the door and locked immediately, the door hit gowardesh fell to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 黑骡子转关上门，立即反锁，狗娃撞到门上摔倒在地。

sentences.english: MULE is a cross between a mare and a donkey.
sentences.chinese: 骡子是母马和公驴的杂交后代。

sentences.english: The interior can be reached by hiking or riding on mules down the trails.
sentences.chinese: 可以徒步走下去或者骑骡子沿山路而下。

sentences.english: A mule is a cross between a mare and a donkey.
sentences.chinese: 骡子是雌马和驴的杂交种。

sentences.english: Or a man with a mule would plow the field of his neighbor in exchange for help in weeding his own land.
sentences.chinese: 有骡子的人替邻居耕地，邻居则帮他锄草作为交换。

sentences.english: He investigated actually various areas in the north one after the other with horses and mules carrying his books for reference.
sentences.chinese: 他先后到北方各地考察，用马和骡子驮着书籍备用。

sentences.english: First, the mule attached to the cart refused to pull.
sentences.chinese: 首先是那匹加上去拖车的骡子耍起了脾气开始罢工。

sentences.english: The mole, s, mouse's and moose's math is worse.
sentences.chinese: 晏鼠，骡子，老鼠和麋鹿的数学越来越差。

definition: animals used for their physical strength (mules, oxen etc)/beast of burden
to pull a carriage (of draft animal)
